title: Republique Remastered [Repack] [TeRM!NaToR]
description:
~INFO~
 - Name : Republique Remastered [Repack] [TeRMiNaToR] [SD TeaM]
 - Languages : English
 - Size After Installation : 4.55 GB
 - Size Required For Install : 4.70 GB
 - Size Before Installation : 1.95 GB
 - Platform : PC
 - Type : Repack
 - Version : V1 Repack
 - Release Date : 25/2/2015
 - By TeRM!NaToR [AmGaD-SaLaH]
 - Nothing Ripped

~INSTALL~
 - Close You AV (AntiVirus)
 - Disconnect Your Internet Connection *
 - Run "Setup.exe" As Admin 
 - The Game Will Install At The Same Direction [Win8+]
 - Select The Install Location For The Process [Win7-]
 - Don't Install The Game In The "C" Partition To Avoid Error-1 
 - Click "Install" Then Wait Till It Finishes 
 - Installation Time : Depending On Your Machine 
 - Before Play Block the Game From Being Online
 - Run The Game Only From It's Folder , Don't Use the Shortcut 
 - May look stuck During installation process , it's not leave it 
 - Enjoy
